O

onBackButtonPressed() - Method in class view.controller.InventoryViewController
Returns to the Cashier UI if user is logged in as cashier or to the Dashboard UI otherwise
onBackButtonPressed() - Method in class view.controller.SettingsViewController
opens the dashboard view and closes the settings view.
onCheckoutPressed() - Method in class view.controller.CashRegisterViewController
The method displys the options of payment methods to the cashier to choose and then displays a confirmation pop up where the cashier can approve or disapprove the transaction
onCheckoutPressed() - Method in class viewmodel.CashRegisterViewModel
 
onCheckoutPressed() - Method in interface viewmodel.CashRegisterViewModelInterface
 
onForceLockButtonPressed() - Method in class view.controller.SettingsViewController
handles the force lock button pressed event and starts the procedure to attempt force locking of the store
onInventoryButtonPressed() - Method in class view.controller.CashRegisterViewController
 
onInventoryButtonPressed() - Method in class view.controller.DashboardViewController
handles the inventory button pressing event by sending displaying a window containing a list of items with three corresponding buttons for each item with the following functionality: - 'Edit Amount' button: displays a Text Input Dialog with a text field input with the default value of the number of items available at the moment in the store; after the user enters a number and presses ok, the number is passed to the viewModel in a corresponding function.
onLogoutButtonPressed() - Method in class view.controller.CashRegisterViewController
 
onLogoutButtonPressed() - Method in class view.controller.DashboardViewController
handles the logout button pressing event by sending a logout signal to the viewModel and opens the start view
onMainButtonPressed() - Method in class view.controller.StartViewController
handles the button pressing event, dynamically switching between the modes of the button, between unlock button or log in button, depending on the status of the store
onPasswordsButtonPressed() - Method in class view.controller.SettingsViewController
handles the passwords button pressing event by displaying a Confirmation Dialog with Custom Actions with the buttons for changing the password for the 'Master' or for the 'Cashier', and a 'Cancel' button to be able to exit.
onScanPressed() - Method in class view.controller.CashRegisterViewController
THe function retrieves the id entered by the user, sets the TextField to a null string.
onScanPressed() - Method in class viewmodel.CashRegisterViewModel
 
onScanPressed() - Method in interface viewmodel.CashRegisterViewModelInterface
 
onSettingsButtonPressed() - Method in class view.controller.DashboardViewController
handles the settings button pressing event by opening the settings view
onWorkingHoursButtonPressed() - Method in class view.controller.SettingsViewController
handles the working hours button pressing event by displaying a Choice Dialog with a dropdown input (with the ability to choose from editing the opening time or the closing time) and a 'Cancel' button; if the user presses OK, Choice Dialog is closed and a new Text Input Dialog is shown, where the user needs to enter the new closing / opening time in the format 'HH:mm', HH - hour in 24h format, mm - minutes)
openingTime - Variable in class model.WorkingHours
 
openView(View) - Method in class view.ViewHandler
